Dear Kawttar Nassik,

DFCM Required Compliance Documents Update




Dear Retailers, 

Greetings from Dubai Festival City Mall Management!

We would like to ensure that as per the signed Lease Agreement and Government Regulatory Requirement, the Compliance documents are up to date.

Dear Retailers, 

Greetings from Dubai Festival City Mall Management!

We would like to ensure that as per the signed Lease Agreement and Government Regulatory Requirement, the Compliance documents are up to date.


Please be reminded that these documents are a pre-requisite for approving any work permits to access the property. Thus, keeping in line with the same, we would request you to share the valid documents as listed below (in case you have not already provided) to the Tenant Relations Department on jennie.concepcion@alfuttaim.com <mailto:jennie.concepcion@alfuttaim.com>  on or before Monday, 16th May 2025.

 

Retailer's Required Documents

 

 

Documents Copy Required

Scope of Service

Contract Minimum Duration

Store Valid Trade License with partners list.

-

Yearly

Property All Risk (PAR) Insurance policy.

 

Yearly

Third Party/Public Liability (TPL) Insurance policy – as per the limit mentioned in your Lease.

Please refer to Particulars Item 31 (Insurance Values) of the signed Lease

Yearly

Workmen compensation

-

Yearly

Pest Control

At least once (1) in a month

Yearly

Life Fire Safety System / FFS and FAS (Must be under Al Futtaim Engineer (AFE) only)

Regularly / Whenever required

Yearly

Annual Maintenance Contract AMC (for General work, fixture, shop cleaning etc.)

Regular (daily)

Yearly

HVAC / Inc AHU / FAHU / FCU (air conditioning unit)

At least once (1) in a month or if required

Yearly

 

 

F&B Tenants Required Documents

 

 

Documents Copy Required

Scope of Service

Contract Minimum Duration

HVAC / Inc AHU / FAHU / FCU (air conditioning unit)

At least once (1) in a month or if required

Yearly

 

 

F&B Tenants Required Documents

 

 

Documents Copy Required

Scope of Service

Contract Minimum Duration

Store Valid Trade License with partners list.

-

Yearly

Property All Risk (PAR) Insurance policy.

-

Third Party/Public Liability (TPL) Insurance policy – as per the limit mentioned in your Lease.

Please refer to Particulars Item 31 (Insurance Values) of the signed Lease

Yearly

Workmen compensation

-

Yearly

Pest Control

At least twice (2) in a month

Yearly

Life Fire Safety System / FFS and FAS (Must be under Al Futtaim Engineer (AFE) only)

Regularly / Whenever required

Yearly

Annual Maintenance Contract AMC (for General work, fixture, shop cleaning etc.)

Regular (daily)

Yearly

HVAC / Inc AHU / FAHU / FCU (air conditioning unit)

At least once (1) in a month or if required

Yearly

LPG (contract with Lootah Gas Company)

At least once (1) in a month

Yearly

Kitchen Exhaust Cleaning

At least once (1) in a month

Yearly

Grease Trap Cleaning

At least twice (2) in a month

Yearly

 

 

Kindly note that there is no exception to the above Compliance documents and are applicable to ALL Retailers. Those who have not submitted their renewed compliance documents to the Tenant Relations Department, please do so within the given timeframe, whilst those Retailers whose Compliance documents are yet to expire within this quarter, please ensure that the renewed documents are provided in a timely manner.

Kindly note that there is no exception to the above Compliance documents and are applicable to ALL Retailers. Those who have not submitted their renewed compliance documents to the Tenant Relations Department, please do so within the given timeframe, whilst those Retailers whose Compliance documents are yet to expire within this quarter, please ensure that the renewed documents are provided in a timely manner. 

 

As a standard practice henceforth, we request that once you renew any of the above listed documents, kindly share a copy to us on the above-mentioned email ID for record purposes. 

 

We look forward to your full support and cooperation as always.



Thank You,
Dubai Festival City Mall
